revised_title: Superfields and Yang-Mills Lagrangians in Supersymmetry
tldr: The authors construct chiral superfields directly from known irreducible particle representations, using standard methods for conventional theories. They then derive the generalized supersymmetric Yang-Mills algebras for specific theories with central charge, from which the chiral superfields and Lagrangians are constructed. This work provides a systematic approach to understanding superfields and super-Lagrangians in supersymmetry.
